name: Cipher Willett
text: I had an awesome tour here when I was looking for a school to go to! They were very friendly and knew answers for most of my questions

name: jared walker
text: Parker was a great guide and did a wonder job.

name: Derek Jamison
text: Moved & the other location is closed until further notice.  :(

name: Julie Kay Nelson
text: Fabulous, knowledgeable staff dedicated to showcasing the Magic City to tourists and conventioneers from around the world.

name: Clarence Threatt III
text: Great place to hear about what is going on in the City of Birmingham.  They also offer reasonable priced souvenirs.

name: Roy Quates
text: Good place to go spread the word of God there

name: britney corey
text: The parking garage is a nightmare. They need to come up with a better system during busy event times.

name: Terral wallace
text: Got a nasty reply from employee named Kimber! ! Totally rude.

name: Mahogany Sharunda Conda
text: The employees were very cheerful and helpful

name: Kristie Church
text: Friendly staff,  got all the information I needed about events coming up.

name: Tosha Hervey
text: Great people

name: Clay Elliott
text: Hard to get around

name: Heather Johnston
text: Location

name: Lara Polk
text: Nice location can't wait to get back and enjoy it in warmer weather

name: Reby Revell
text: The history about this dam,and area is a bookful of awesome information that I never knew. This dam enabled inland water way travel that we take for granted. It is breathtaking to see.Its a must for everyone.

name: Matthew Smith
text:
The overlook was kind of neat...good place to get a view of the dam from a higher than normal vantage point.  Only gave one star due to the fact that the visitor center was closed despite the fact that the TVA website said it was open to the public.

I went and took a tour of the turbine hall and visitor center when i was young, and was looking forward to sharing the experience with my children.

name: James Zahn
text: The visitor center has been closed permanently. There is an overlooked which is pretty nice.

name: Steven Stark
text: Open to the Public...Free! Decent info, great views.

name: Brian Dunaway
text: Great view. Definitely worth the trip.

name: Larry j. Tippett
text: Awsome views  many different species of waterfowl

name: emma zills (OVER50LIFE)
text: Awe inspiring indeed.

name: D Henderson
text: Great history!

name: Anne Oppegard
text: Visitors Center closed. Gate to  Locks Overlook drive locked.

name: William Barnes
text: Beautiful trails, waterfalls and scenery.

name: Ryan Clayton
text: Great view

name: Jim Revels
text: Warm greeting and welcoming.  Excited that we showed intereat in joining.

name: Kristie Lovelace
text: The chamber is great! Everyone there genuinely cares for us, our businesses and our community. We are all so lucky to have a great bunch of people focused on making our local communities the best they can be and helping businesses to succeed and thrive. Membership is worth every penny and then some!

resp.text: Thank you! It's our absolute pleasure and we appreciate you!

name: Ashley Colon
text: I have been impressed with the marketing that Sarah has brought to the Chamber.  Not only has she increased the growth for the Chamber, but she is sharing her knowledge for local businesses.  Sarah isn't the only friendly face at the Chamber.  I absolutely love the special treatment I receive when I walk in the door.  Thankful doesn't even begin to describe how I am for the Chamber helping me to grow my business!

name: Sarah Stahl
text: An innovative Chamber who partners well with regional organizations to ensure progress & growth continue to move forward in Jackson Co. Alabama!

name: Elaine Slater
text: So many great things are happening at the Mountain Lakes Chamber of Commerce!  The staff is willing and able to help businesses and communities with their business needs.

name: Vanessa Landreth
text: The Mountain Lakes Chamber Of Commerce is the best!! Their all great and do so much for our community!!

resp.text: We truly 💙 love our community and want the best for each and every business throughout Jackson Co!

name: James Trott
text: Great

resp.text: Thanks for your support James, WE appreciate you!

name: AJ Buckner
text: Very friendly, informative, and helpful
